events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for the Software Developer position.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
Your profile looks promising. We conducted an initial screening over the phone and are interested in proceeding further.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
We have scheduled your technical interview for Thursday, May 9th, at 2 PM UTC via video call.
Congratulations on completing the technical interview. The feedback from the panel was very encouraging regarding your coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for Monday, May 13th, at 10 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and we are excited to move you forward with an offer.
We have sent you the formal offer letter for the Software Engineer position, including salary and benefits details.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are thrilled to hear that you are excited about joining our team.
We are delighted to confirm that you have accepted our offer. Welcome aboard as our new Software Engineer!
Your onboarding process has started. Please check your email for all the necessary documents and training schedules.
The hiring process is now complete. We are excited to officially welcome you to our engineering team.
